text: is a Japanese skier. He competed in the Nordic combined events at the 1976 Winter Olympics and the 1980 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Japan Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1976 Winter Olympics Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1980 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Niigata Prefecture
title: Michio Kubota
